original: 13,006.010a śubhena karmaṇā saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ pāpena karmaṇā

original: 13,006.010c kṛtaṃ sarvatra labhate nākṛtaṃ bhujyate kva cit

original: 13,006.015a artho vā mitravargo vā aiśvaryaṃ vā kulānvitam

original: 13,024.018a anuyoktā ca yo vipro anuyuktaś ca bhārata

original: 13,024.019a agraṇīr yaḥ kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ varṇāvaraparigrahaḥ

original: 13,024.021c putrikāpūrvaputrāś ca śrāddhe nārhanti ketanam
analyzed: putrikā pūrva putrāḥ ca śrāddhe na arhanti ketanam

original: 13,024.025a cīrṇavratā guṇair yuktā bhaveyur ye 'pi karṣakāḥ

original: 13,024.027a agnihotrī ca yo vipro grāmavāsī ca yo bhavet

original: 13,024.027c astenaś cātithijñaś ca sa rājan ketanakṣamaḥ

original: 13,024.041a dātuḥ pratigrahītuś ca dharmādharmāv imau śṛṇu

original: 13,024.044c asnāto brāhmaṇo rājaṃs tasyādharmo gavānṛtam

original: 13,024.045a āśauco brāhmaṇo rājan yo 'śnīyād brāhmaṇādiṣu

original: 13,024.049c uccheṣapariśeṣaṃ hi tān bhojaya yudhiṣṭhira

original: 13,024.057a kṛtasarvasvaharaṇā nirdoṣāḥ prabhaviṣṇubhiḥ

analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 13,064.001a sarvān kāmān prayacchanti ye prayacchanti kāñcanam

analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

analyzed: bhaikṣa caryā paraḥ dharmaḥ dharmaḥ nitya upavāsi tā

original: 13,128.036c nityasvādhyāyitā dharmo brahmacaryāśramas tathā
analyzed: nitya svādhyāyi tā dharmaḥ brahmacarya āśramaḥ tathā

original: 13,128.037a guruṇā tv abhyanujñātaḥ samāvarteta vai dvijaḥ
analyzed: guruṇā tu abhyanujñātaḥ samāvarteta vai dvijaḥ

original: 13,128.037c vindetānantaraṃ bhāryām anurūpāṃ yathāvidhi
analyzed: vindeta anantaram bhāryām anurūpām yathāvidhi

original: 13,128.038a śūdrānnavarjanaṃ dharmas tathā satpathasevanam
analyzed: śūdra anna varjanam dharmaḥ tathā sat patha sevanam

original: 13,128.038c dharmo nityopavāsitvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: dharmaḥ nitya upavāsi tvam brahmacaryam tathā eva ca

original: 13,128.039a āhitāgnir adhīyāno juhvānaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: āhitāgniḥ adhīyānaḥ juhvānaḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: 13,128.039c vighasāśī yatāhāro gṛhasthaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ
analyzed: vighasa āśī yata āhāraḥ gṛhasthaḥ satya vāc śuciḥ

original: 13,128.040a atithivratatā dharmo dharmas tretāgnidhāraṇam
analyzed: atithi vrata tā dharmaḥ dharmaḥ tretāgni dhāraṇam

original: 13,128.040c iṣṭīś ca paśubandhāṃś ca vidhipūrvaṃ samācaret
analyzed: iṣṭīḥ ca paśubandhān ca vidhi pūrvam samācaret

original: 13,128.041a yajñaś ca paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā ca dehiṣu
analyzed: yajñaḥ ca paramaḥ dharmaḥ tathā ahiṃsā ca dehiṣu

original: 13,128.041c apūrvabhojanaṃ dharmo vighasāśitvam eva ca
analyzed: a pūrva bhojanam dharmaḥ vighasa āśi tvam eva ca

original: 13,128.042a bhukte parijane paścād bhojanaṃ dharma ucyate
analyzed: bhukte parijane paścāt bhojanam dharmaḥ ucyate

original: 13,128.042c brāhmaṇasya gṛhasthasya śrotriyasya viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya gṛhasthasya śrotriyasya viśeṣataḥ

original: 13,128.043a daṃpatyoḥ samaśīlatvaṃ dharmaś ca gṛhamedhinām
analyzed: daṃpatyoḥ sama śīla tvam dharmaḥ ca gṛhamedhinām

original: 13,128.043c gṛhyāṇāṃ caiva devānāṃ nityaṃ puṣpabalikriyā
analyzed: gṛhyāṇām ca eva devānām nityam puṣpa bali kriyā

original: 13,128.044a nityopalepanaṃ dharmas tathā nityopavāsitā
analyzed: nitya upalepanam dharmaḥ tathā nitya upavāsi tā

original: 13,128.044c susaṃmṛṣṭopalipte ca sājyadhūmodgame gṛhe
analyzed: su saṃmṛṣṭa upalipte ca sa ājya dhūma udgame gṛhe

original: 13,128.045a eṣa dvijajane dharmo gārhasthyo lokadhāraṇaḥ
analyzed: eṣa dvija jane dharmaḥ gārhasthyaḥ loka dhāraṇaḥ

original: 13,128.045c dvijātīnāṃ satāṃ nityaṃ sadaivaiṣa pravartate
analyzed: dvijātīnām satām nityam sadā eva eṣa pravartate

original: 13,128.046a yas tu kṣatragato devi tvayā dharma udīritaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu kṣatra gataḥ devi tvayā dharmaḥ udīritaḥ

original: 13,128.046c tam ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi taṃ me śṛṇu samāhitā
analyzed: tam aham te pravakṣyāmi tam me śṛṇu samāhitā

original: 13,128.047a kṣatriyasya smṛto dharmaḥ prajāpālanam āditaḥ
analyzed: kṣatriyasya smṛtaḥ dharmaḥ prajā pālanam āditas

original: 13,128.047c nirdiṣṭaphalabhoktā hi rājā dharmeṇa yujyate
analyzed: nirdiṣṭa phala bhoktā hi rājā dharmeṇa yujyate

original: 13,128.048a prajāḥ pālayate yo hi dharmeṇa manujādhipaḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ pālayate yaḥ hi dharmeṇa manuja adhipaḥ

original: 13,128.048c tasya dharmārjitā lokāḥ prajāpālanasaṃcitāḥ
analyzed: tasya dharma arjitāḥ lokāḥ prajā pālana saṃcitāḥ

original: 13,128.049a tatra rājñaḥ paro dharmo damaḥ svādhyāya eva ca
analyzed: tatra rājñaḥ paraḥ dharmaḥ damaḥ svādhyāyaḥ eva ca

original: 13,128.049c agnihotraparispando dānādhyayanam eva ca
analyzed: agnihotra parispandaḥ dāna adhyayanam eva ca

original: 13,128.050a yajñopavītadhāraṇaṃ yajño dharmakriyās tathā
analyzed: yajñopavīta dhāraṇam yajñaḥ dharma kriyāḥ tathā

original: 13,128.050c bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
analyzed: bhṛtyānām bharaṇam dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇi amogha tā

original: 13,128.051a samyag daṇḍe sthitir dharmo dharmo vedakratukriyāḥ
analyzed: samyak daṇḍe sthitiḥ dharmaḥ dharmaḥ veda kratu kriyāḥ

original: 13,128.051c vyavahārasthitir dharmaḥ satyavākyaratis tathā
analyzed: vyavahāra sthitiḥ dharmaḥ satya vākya ratiḥ tathā

original: 13,128.052a ārtahastaprado rājā pretya ceha mahīyate
analyzed: ārta hasta pradaḥ rājā pretya ca iha mahīyate

original: 13,128.052c gobrāhmaṇārthe vikrāntaḥ saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: go brāhmaṇa arthe vikrāntaḥ saṃgrāme nidhanam gataḥ

original: 13,128.052e aśvamedhajitāṃl lokān prāpnoti tridivālaye
analyzed: aśvamedha jitān lokān prāpnoti tridiva ālaye

original: 13,128.053a vaiśyasya satataṃ dharmaḥ pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣis tathā
analyzed: vaiśyasya satatam dharmaḥ pāśupālyam kṛṣiḥ tathā

original: 13,128.053c agnihotraparispando dānādhyayanam eva ca
analyzed: agnihotra parispandaḥ dāna adhyayanam eva ca

original: 13,128.054a vāṇijyaṃ satpathasthānam ātithyaṃ praśamo damaḥ
analyzed: vāṇijyam sat patha sthānam ātithyam praśamaḥ damaḥ

original: 13,128.054c viprāṇāṃ svāgataṃ tyāgo vaiśyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: viprāṇām svāgatam tyāgaḥ vaiśya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 13,128.055a tilān gandhān rasāṃś caiva na vikrīṇīta vai kva cit
analyzed: tilān gandhān rasān ca eva na vikrīṇīta vai kva cit

original: 13,128.055c vaṇikpatham upāsīno vaiśyaḥ satpatham āśritaḥ
analyzed: vaṇikpatham upāsīnaḥ vaiśyaḥ sat patham āśritaḥ

original: 13,128.056a sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti yathārhataḥ
analyzed: sarva ātithyam trivargasya yathāśakti yathārhataḥ

original: 13,128.056c śūdradharmaḥ paro nityaṃ śuśrūṣā ca dvijātiṣu
analyzed: śūdra dharmaḥ paraḥ nityam śuśrūṣā ca dvijātiṣu

original: 13,128.057a sa śūdraḥ saṃśitatapāḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: sa śūdraḥ saṃśita tapāḥ satya saṃdhaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: 13,128.057c śuśrūṣann atithiṃ prāptaṃ tapaḥ saṃcinute mahat
analyzed: śuśrūṣan atithim prāptam tapaḥ saṃcinute mahat

original: 13,128.058a tyaktahiṃsaḥ śubhācāro devatādvijapūjakaḥ
13,128.058c śūdro dharmaphalair iṣṭaiḥ saṃprayujyeta buddhimān
analyzed: śūdraḥ dharma phalaiḥ iṣṭaiḥ saṃprayujyeta buddhimān

original: 13,128.059a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ cāturvarṇyasya śobhane
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam cāturvarṇyasya śobhane

original: 13,128.059c ekaikasyeha subhage kim anyac chrotum icchasi
analyzed: ekaikasya iha subhage kim anyat śrotum icchasi

original: 13,129.001 umovāca
analyzed: umā uvāca

original: 13,129.001a uktās tvayā pṛthagdharmāś cāturvarṇyahitāḥ śubhāḥ
analyzed: uktāḥ tvayā pṛthak dharmāḥ cāturvarṇya hitāḥ śubhāḥ

original: 13,129.001c sarvavyāpī tu yo dharmo bhagavaṃs taṃ bravīhi me
analyzed: sarvavyāpī tu yaḥ dharmaḥ bhagavan tam bravīhi me

original: 13,129.002 maheśvara uvāca
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ uvāca

original: 13,129.002a brāhmaṇā lokasāreṇa sṛṣṭā dhātrā guṇārthinā
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ loka sāreṇa sṛṣṭāḥ dhātrā guṇa arthinā

original: 13,129.002c lokāṃs tārayituṃ kṛtsnān martyeṣu kṣitidevatāḥ
analyzed: lokān tārayitum kṛtsnān martyeṣu kṣitidevatāḥ

original: 13,129.003a teṣām imaṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmakarmaphalodayam
analyzed: teṣām imam pravakṣyāmi dharma karma phala udayam

original: 13,129.003c brāhmaṇeṣu hi yo dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ paramo mataḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇeṣu hi yaḥ dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ paramaḥ mataḥ

original: 13,129.004a ime tu lokadharmārthaṃ trayaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
analyzed: ime tu loka dharma artham trayaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā

original: 13,129.004c pṛthivyāḥ sarjane nityaṃ sṛṣṭās tān api me śṛṇu
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ sarjane nityam sṛṣṭāḥ tān api me śṛṇu

original: 13,129.005a vedoktaḥ paramo dharmaḥ smṛtiśāstragato 'paraḥ
analyzed: veda uktaḥ paramaḥ dharmaḥ paraḥ

original: 13,129.005c śiṣṭācīrṇaḥ paraḥ proktas trayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
analyzed: śiṣṭa ācīrṇaḥ paraḥ proktaḥ trayaḥ dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ

original: 13,129.006a traividyo brāhmaṇo vidvān na cādhyayanajīvanaḥ
analyzed: traividyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ vidvān na ca adhyayana jīvanaḥ

original: 13,129.006c trikarmā triparikrānto maitra eṣa smṛto dvijaḥ
analyzed: tri karmā tri parikrāntaḥ maitraḥ eṣa smṛtaḥ dvijaḥ

original: 13,129.007a ṣaḍ imāni tu karmāṇi provāca bhuvaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: ṣaḍ imāni tu karmāṇi provāca bhuvaneśvaraḥ

original: 13,129.007c vṛttyarthaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vai śṛṇu tāni samāhitā
analyzed: vṛtti artham brāhmaṇānām vai śṛṇu tāni samāhitā

original: 13,129.008a yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva tathā dānapratigrahau
analyzed: yajanam yājanam ca eva tathā dāna pratigrahau

original: 13,129.008c adhyāpanam adhītaṃ ca ṣaṭkarmā dharmabhāg dvijaḥ
analyzed: adhyāpanam adhītam ca ṣaṣ karmā dharma bhāj dvijaḥ

original: 13,129.009a nityasvādhyāyatā dharmo dharmo yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: nitya svādhyāya tā dharmaḥ dharmaḥ yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 13,129.009c dānaṃ praśasyate cāsya yathāśakti yathāvidhi
analyzed: dānam praśasyate ca asya yathāśakti yathāvidhi

original: 13,129.010a ayaṃ tu paramo dharmaḥ pravṛttaḥ satsu nityaśaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu paramaḥ dharmaḥ pravṛttaḥ satsu nityaśas

original: 13,129.010c gṛhasthatā viśuddhānāṃ dharmasya nicayo mahān
analyzed: gṛhastha tā viśuddhānām dharmasya nicayaḥ mahān

original: 13,129.011a pañcayajñaviśuddhātmā satyavāg anasūyakaḥ
13,129.011c dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā susaṃmṛṣṭaniveśanaḥ
13,129.012a amānī ca sadājihmaḥ snigdhavāṇīpradas tathā
analyzed: a mānī ca sadā a jihmaḥ snigdha vāṇī pradaḥ tathā

original: 13,129.012c atithyabhyāgataratiḥ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ
13,129.013a pādyam arghyaṃ yathānyāyam āsanaṃ śayanaṃ tathā
analyzed: pādyam arghyam yathānyāyam āsanam śayanam tathā

original: 13,129.013c dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ cāpi yo dadāti sa dhārmikaḥ
analyzed: dīpam pratiśrayam ca api yaḥ dadāti sa dhārmikaḥ

original: 13,129.014a prātar utthāya cācamya bhojanenopamantrya ca
analyzed: prātar utthāya ca ācamya bhojanena upamantrya ca

original: 13,129.014c satkṛtyānuvrajed yaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: satkṛtya anuvrajet yaḥ ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 13,129.015a sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti divāniśam
analyzed: sarva ātithyam trivargasya yathāśakti divāniśam

original: 13,129.015c śūdradharmaḥ samākhyātas trivarṇaparicāraṇam
analyzed: śūdra dharmaḥ samākhyātaḥ tri varṇa paricāraṇam

original: 13,129.016a pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo gṛhastheṣu vidhīyate
analyzed: pravṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ gṛhastheṣu vidhīyate

original: 13,129.016c tam ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi sarvabhūtahitaṃ śubham
analyzed: tam aham kīrtayiṣyāmi sarva bhūta hitam śubham

original: 13,129.017a dātavyam asakṛc chaktyā yaṣṭavyam asakṛt tathā
analyzed: dātavyam asakṛt śaktyā yaṣṭavyam asakṛt tathā

original: 13,129.017c puṣṭikarmavidhānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
analyzed: puṣṭi karma vidhānam ca kartavyam bhūtim icchatā

original: 13,129.018a dharmeṇārthaḥ samāhāryo dharmalabdhaṃ tridhā dhanam
analyzed: dharmeṇa arthaḥ samāhāryaḥ dharma labdham tridhā dhanam

original: 13,129.018c kartavyaṃ dharmaparamaṃ mānavena prayatnataḥ
analyzed: kartavyam dharma paramam mānavena prayatnataḥ

original: 13,129.019a ekenāṃśena dharmārthaś cartavyo bhūtim icchatā
analyzed: ekena aṃśena dharma arthaḥ cartavyaḥ bhūtim icchatā

original: 13,129.019c ekenāṃśena kāmārtha ekam aṃśaṃ vivardhayet
analyzed: ekena aṃśena kāma arthaḥ ekam aṃśam vivardhayet

original: 13,129.020a nivṛttilakṣaṇas tv anyo dharmo mokṣa iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: nivṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ tu anyaḥ dharmaḥ mokṣaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: 13,129.020c tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu me devi tattvataḥ
analyzed: tasya vṛttim pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu me devi tattvataḥ

original: 13,129.021a sarvabhūtadayā dharmo na caikagrāmavāsitā
analyzed: sarva bhūta dayā dharmaḥ na ca eka grāma vāsi tā

original: 13,129.021c āśāpāśavimokṣaś ca śasyate mokṣakāṅkṣiṇām
analyzed: āśā pāśa vimokṣaḥ ca śasyate mokṣa kāṅkṣiṇām

original: 13,129.022a na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅgo na vāsasi na cāsane
analyzed: na kuṇḍyām na udake saṅgaḥ na vāsasi na ca āsane

original: 13,129.022c na tridaṇḍe na śayane nāgnau na śaraṇālaye
analyzed: na tridaṇḍe na śayane na agnau na śaraṇa ālaye

original: 13,129.023a adhyātmagatacitto yas tanmanās tatparāyaṇaḥ
13,129.023c yukto yogaṃ prati sadā pratisaṃkhyānam eva ca
analyzed: yuktaḥ yogam prati sadā pratisaṃkhyānam eva ca

original: 13,129.024a vṛkṣamūlaśayo nityaṃ śūnyāgāraniveśanaḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣa mūla śayaḥ nityam śūnya āgāra niveśanaḥ

original: 13,129.024c nadīpulinaśāyī ca nadītīraratiś ca yaḥ
analyzed: nadī pulina śāyī ca nadī tīra ratiḥ ca yaḥ

original: 13,129.025a vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgeṣu snehabandheṣu ca dvijaḥ
analyzed: vimuktaḥ sarva saṅgeṣu sneha bandheṣu ca dvijaḥ

original: 13,129.025c ātmany evātmano bhāvaṃ samāsajyāṭati dvijaḥ
analyzed: ātmani eva ātmanaḥ bhāvam samāsajya aṭati dvijaḥ

original: 13,129.026a sthāṇubhūto nirāhāro mokṣadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
analyzed: sthāṇu bhūtaḥ nirāhāraḥ mokṣa dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: 13,129.026c parivrajati yo yuktas tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: parivrajati yaḥ yuktaḥ tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 13,129.027a na caikatra cirāsakto na caikagrāmagocaraḥ
analyzed: na ca ekatra cira āsaktaḥ na ca eka grāma gocaraḥ

original: 13,129.027c yukto hy aṭati nirmukto na caikapulineśayaḥ
analyzed: yuktaḥ hi aṭati nirmuktaḥ na ca eka puline śayaḥ

original: 13,129.028a eṣa mokṣavidāṃ dharmo vedoktaḥ satpathaḥ satām
analyzed: eṣa mokṣa vidām dharmaḥ veda uktaḥ sat pathaḥ satām

original: 13,129.028c yo mārgam anuyātīmaṃ padaṃ tasya na vidyate
analyzed: yaḥ mārgam anuyāti imam padam tasya na vidyate

original: 13,129.029a caturvidhā bhikṣavas te kuṭīcarakṛtodakaḥ
analyzed: caturvidhāḥ bhikṣavaḥ te kuṭī cara kṛta udakaḥ

original: 13,129.029c haṃsaḥ paramahaṃsaś ca yo yaḥ paścāt sa uttamaḥ
analyzed: haṃsaḥ paramahaṃsaḥ ca yaḥ yaḥ paścāt saḥ uttamaḥ

original: 13,129.030a ataḥ parataraṃ nāsti nādharaṃ na tiro 'grataḥ
analyzed: atas parataram na asti na adharam na tiras gratas

original: 13,129.030c aduḥkham asukhaṃ saumyam ajarāmaram avyayam
analyzed: aduḥkham asukham saumyam ajara amaram avyayam

original: 13,129.031 umovāca
analyzed: umā uvāca

original: 13,129.031a gārhasthyo mokṣadharmaś ca sajjanācaritas tvayā
analyzed: gārhasthyaḥ mokṣa dharmaḥ ca sat jana ācaritaḥ tvayā

original: 13,129.031c bhāṣito martyalokasya mārgaḥ śreyaskaro mahān
analyzed: bhāṣitaḥ martya lokasya mārgaḥ śreyaskaraḥ mahān

original: 13,129.032a ṛṣidharmaṃ tu dharmajña śrotum icchāmy anuttamam
analyzed: ṛṣi dharmam tu dharma jña śrotum icchāmi anuttamam

original: 13,129.032c spṛhā bhavati me nityaṃ tapovananivāsiṣu
analyzed: spṛhā bhavati me nityam tapaḥ vana nivāsiṣu

original: 13,129.033a ājyadhūmodbhavo gandho ruṇaddhīva tapovanam
analyzed: ājya dhūma udbhavaḥ gandhaḥ ruṇaddhi iva tapaḥ vanam

original: 13,129.033c taṃ dṛṣṭvā me manaḥ prītaṃ maheśvara sadā bhavet
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā me manaḥ prītam maheśvara sadā bhavet

original: 13,129.034a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva munidharmakṛtaṃ vibho
analyzed: etam me saṃśayam deva muni dharma kṛtam vibho

original: 13,129.034c sarvadharmārthatattvajña devadeva vadasva me
analyzed: sarva dharma artha tattva jña devadeva vadasva me

original: 13,129.034e nikhilena mayā pṛṣṭaṃ mahādeva yathātatham
analyzed: nikhilena mayā pṛṣṭam mahādeva yathātatham

original: 13,129.035 maheśvara uvāca
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ uvāca

original: 13,129.035a hanta te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi munidharmam anuttamam
analyzed: hanta te ham pravakṣyāmi muni dharmam anuttamam

original: 13,129.035c yaṃ kṛtvā munayo yānti siddhiṃ svatapasā śubhe
analyzed: yam kṛtvā munayaḥ yānti siddhim sva tapasā śubhe

original: 13,129.036a phenapānām ṛṣīṇāṃ yo dharmo dharmavidāṃ sadā

original: 13,130.040c dīkṣito vai mudā yuktaḥ sa gacchaty amarāvatīm

analyzed: ātmānam upajīvan yaḥ niyataḥ niyata aśanaḥ

analyzed: ātmānam upajīvan yaḥ dīkṣām dvādaśa vārṣikīm

original: 13,130.048c tyaktvā mahārṇave dehaṃ vāruṇaṃ lokam aśnute

original: 13,130.049a ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm
analyzed: ātmānam upajīvan yaḥ dīkṣām dvādaśa vārṣikīm

original: 13,130.049c aśmanā caraṇau bhittvā guhyakeṣu sa modate
analyzed: aśmanā caraṇau bhittvā guhyakeṣu sa modate

analyzed: sādhayitvā ātmanā ātmānam nirdvaṃdvaḥ niṣparigrahaḥ

analyzed: cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekām manaḥ gatām

original: 13,130.050e svargalokam avāpnoti devaiś ca saha modate

original: 13,130.053a cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatām

analyzed: eṣa devi satām mārgaḥ bādhā yatra na vidyate

original: 13,133.043 umovāca
